alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 24 at 9:55AM MDT until May 24 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Periods of localized and intermittent heavy snow, sleet, and very small hail producing quick accumulations of 2 to 5 inches of wintry precipitation. * WHERE...Leadville Vicinity/Lake County Below 11000 Feet, Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet, Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet, and Teller County/Rampart Range Above 7500 Feet/Pikes Peak Between 7500 and 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
